agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Higher Education TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, April 24, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Turner HB 4558 Fierro Relating to the curriculum requirements in government or political science at institutions of higher education. SB 212 Huffman | et al. Relating to a reporting requirement for certain incidents of sexual harassment, sexual assault, dating violence, or stalking at certain public and private institutions of higher education; creating a criminal offense; authorizing administrative penalties. HB 3621 Schaefer Relating to a requirement that a student's postsecondary transcript include the average or median grade awarded in each class. HB 3797 Toth Relating to the annexation of territory by a junior college district. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
